== Maranalloor (628527) ==

== Demography & Population ==

Maranalloor is a village in the [[Neyyattinkara]] taluka of [[Thiruvananthapuram]] district with an area of 2513 hectares and harbouring 9679 households with total population of 36550 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Neyyattinkara]] is at a distance of 8 km. Male population is 17816 and female population is 18734. Scheduled Caste Population is 5454 and Scheduled Tribes population is 130. Census Location Code of the village is 628527<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 30679 (83.94%)
* Literate male population: 15165 (85.12%)
* Literate female population: 15514 (82.81%)
